import React from 'react' import {useState} from 'react' import '../pages/style.css' import axios from 'axios' const Add = ({onConfirm, onClose, semester_id,course_id, group_id}) => { const [time, setTime] = useState({ semester_id: semester_id, course_id: course_id, group_id: clas.group_id, time_week: null, time_day: null, time_start: null, time_end: null }) const handleChange = (e) =>{ setTime(prev => ({...prev, [e.target.name]: e.target.value})) } console.log(time) const handleClick = async e => { e.preventDefault() try { await axios.post("http://localhost:8800/time", time); window.location.reload(); }catch(err){ console.log(err) } } return(

Add a new timer

) } export default Add
